I've checked in a package I think should be usasble.  There are
instructions for installation and all the necessary scripts.  I'll be
getting it up and running on crawl08 when I hear from Joerg about
postgres.

Feel free to mess around with it if you like,

pt.
-- 
Parker Thompson

On Mon, 29 Dec 2003, Parker Thompson wrote:

|Hello,
|
|I'm (I think) ready to get that crawler testing stuff into CVS.  I wanted 
|to send out that link I promised (long ago) to the existing version, and 
|ask you to look it over:
|
|  http://parkert.com/crawlertest/
|
|I still haven't got the htaccess tests implemented, but didn't want this
|to stall any longer, and everything else should (in theory) be fine.  But 
|I suspect if you bang on this there's still a bug or two to be found.
|
|Thanks,
|
|pt.
